section.title: 显示行号
section.screen: [root@localhost ~]# grep -n 'ftp' /etc/passwd 12:ftp:x:14:50:FTP User:/var/ftp:/sbin/nologin

section.title: -o, --only-matching show only the part of a line matching PATTERN
section.screen: $ curl -s http://www.example.com | egrep -o '.*' | sed -e 's/.*href="\([^"]*\)".*/\1/'
$ mysqlshow | egrep -o "|\w(.*)\w|" Databases information_schema test

$ cat file.html | grep -o \ -E '\b(([\w-]+://?|www[.])[^\s()<>]+(?:\([\w\d]+\)|([^[:punct:]\s]|/)))'
$ cat file.html | grep -o -E 'href="([^"#]+)"'
$ cat sss.html | grep -o -E 'thunder://([^<]+)'

section.title: -A, --after-context=NUM print NUM lines of trailing context
section.para: 返回匹配当前行至下面N行
section.screen:
# grep -A1 game /etc/passwd games:x:12:100:games:/usr/games:/sbin/nologin gopher:x:13:30:gopher:/var/gopher:/sbin/nologin
# grep -A2 game /etc/passwd games:x:12:100:games:/usr/games:/sbin/nologin gopher:x:13:30:gopher:/var/gopher:/sbin/nologin ftp:x:14:50:FTP User:/var/ftp:/sbin/nologin

section.title: -B, --before-context=NUM print NUM lines of leading context
section.para: 返回匹配当前行至上面N行
section.screen:
# grep -B1 game /etc/passwd operator:x:11:0:operator:/root:/sbin/nologin games:x:12:100:games:/usr/games:/sbin/nologin
# grep -B2 game /etc/passwd uucp:x:10:14:uucp:/var/spool/uucp:/sbin/nologin operator:x:11:0:operator:/root:/sbin/nologin games:x:12:100:games:/usr/games:/sbin/nologin

section.title: --color
section.screen: # grep --color root /etc/passwd root:x:0:0:root:/root:/bin/bash operator:x:11:0:operator:/root:/sbin/nologin
section.para: 可以通过alias别名启用--color选项
section.screen: alias egrep='egrep --color=auto' alias fgrep='fgrep --color=auto' alias grep='grep --color=auto'
section.para: 加入.bashrc中，每次用户登录将自动生效
section.screen:
# enable color support of ls and also add handy aliases if [ -x /usr/bin/dircolors ]; then test -r ~/.dircolors && eval "$(dircolors -b ~/.dircolors)" || eval "$(dircolors -b)" alias ls='ls --color=auto' #alias dir='dir --color=auto' #alias vdir='vdir --color=auto'
alias grep='grep --color=auto' alias fgrep='fgrep --color=auto' alias egrep='egrep --color=auto' fi

fgrep -rl `echo -ne '\r'` .

section.title: egrep
section.para: egrep = grep -E 在egrep中不许看使用转意字符，例如
section.screen:
# grep '\(oo\).*\1' /etc/passwd root:x:0:0:root:/root:/bin/bash
# grep -E '(oo).*\1' /etc/passwd root:x:0:0:root:/root:/bin/bash
# egrep '(oo).*\1' /etc/passwd root:x:0:0:root:/root:/bin/bash

$ snmpwalk -v2c -c public 172.16.1.254 | egrep -i 'if(in|out)'
for pid in $(ps -axf |grep 'php-cgi' | egrep egrep "0:00.(6|7|8|9)"'{print $1}'); do kill -9 $pid; done
for pid in $(ps -axf |grep 'php-cgi' | egrep "0:(0|1|2|3|4|5)0.(6|7|8|9)" |awk '{print $1}'); do kill -9 $pid; done
